div.p: GRG 35/20/22, no. 2426/72, outward letter press copy books, p. 2463, Department of Lands, State Records of South Australia, Adelaide.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;

div.p:
The duties of the Surveyor General
George Goyder. having obliged him again to leave Town, he directed me previous to his departure to prepare and forward to you, with his very best wishes, a copy of the Instructions he handed to Mr W. C. Gosse, the Leader of the Western Exploring Expedition, which I now have much pleasure in doing — The Surveyor General will himself write to you on his return.
